title: Impresario Hospitality plans to go public in 2-3 years: Riyaaz Amlani, Founder and MD
description: While India's quick service restaurant (QSR) segment has multiple listed firms, including Devyani International, Sapphire Foods and Burger King India, the casual dining restaurant (CDR) space has only a few. The last listing in this segment was of Barbeque Nation Hospitality in September 2021.
